    "product_title": "Redmi Note 11 PRO Plus 5G (Stealth Black, 128 GB)",
    "reviews": [
        {
            "content": "Honest review after using it for three days. 1. Look and feel - Awesome! Camo Green colour is amazing. It's very handy and comfortable in typing. 2. Display and refresh rate - I feel the refresh rate is not well 3. Performance - Very Good. optimised, still good. Hopefully, system updates will make it smoother. Till now I haven't felt any lag. 4. Battery and charging - Good battery backup of 1-day on normal use, if you're a heavy user then it depends. Full charge in 45-50 mins(normal charge version). 5. Rear camera - Nice, don't expect great performance in low light. 6. Selfie Camera - Decent: The selfie camera may not completely satisfy you for this price point. Still, you can capture good pictures in daylight. 7. Audio - Dual stereo speakers on top and bottom make the voice symmetric, crisp and louder. 8. Video - Full HD is not very crisp, but I've heard that this will be taken care of in subsequent updates. 9. Connectivity - Great. Overall an all-rounder but price seems to be little high.",
            "dislikes": 58,
            "likes": 109,
            "rating": 5,
            "title": "Brilliant",
            "verified_purchase": true
        },
        {
            "content": "Mobile is good if you are not interested in photography. camera is 108 MP but photo and video quality is not up to the mark. all other app are working OK. face detection is very impressive for screen unlock. as i have installed only few app all are working very smoothly",

response.name: New Request
response.body:
{
    "average_rating": "4.2",
    "histogram": {
        "1": 179,
        "2": 55,
        "3": 146,
        "4": 423,
        "5": 1111
    },
    "product_title": "Redmi Note 11 PRO Plus 5G (Stealth Black, 128 GB)",
    "reviews": [
        {
            "content": "Honest review after using it for three days. 1. Look and feel - Awesome! Camo Green colour is amazing. It's very handy and comfortable in typing. 2. Display and refresh rate - I feel the refresh rate is not well 3. Performance - Very Good. optimised, still good. Hopefully, system updates will make it smoother. Till now I haven't felt any lag. 4. Battery and charging - Good battery backup of 1-day on normal use, if you're a heavy user then it depends. Full charge in 45-50 mins(normal charge version). 5. Rear camera - Nice, don't expect great performance in low light. 6. Selfie Camera - Decent: The selfie camera may not completely satisfy you for this price point. Still, you can capture good pictures in daylight. 7. Audio - Dual stereo speakers on top and bottom make the voice symmetric, crisp and louder. 8.
